snippet: The investigation aims to determine the activities and role of Brotherhood members who fled to London after the military crackdown in Egypt.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron orders inquiry into activities of Muslim Brotherhood to determine whether group is using London as base for planning extremist attacks after military crackdown in Egypt.
lead_paragraph: The investigation aims to determine the activities and role of Brotherhood members who fled to London after the military crackdown in Egypt.

headline.main: Britain Orders Inquiry Into Muslim Brotherhood in London
headline.print_headline: Britain Orders Inquiry Into Muslim Brotherhood in London
